attributes.action: halt the proliferation of laws that are subtly eating away at our centuries old notions of personal liberty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of the great achievements of the United Kingdom is the establishment of a notion of personal freedom. Based on trust and compromise this has enabled us to govern ourselves almost entirely without recourse to violent revolution. In recent years there has been a tendency to overlook this achievement, with intrusive legislation and a subtle overturning of the notion of 'innocent till proven guilty'. Worse, all of this has gone virtually unchallenged. We must guard against throwing away hard-earned freedoms - once gone, they are hard to retrieve,
